brp.header: What are your biometric residence permit (BRP) details?
brp.intro: Enter your details as they appear on your BRP.

confirm.text1: We have offered you a loan based on the terms of your agreement, sent to you by email or post.
confirm.text2: By clicking ‘accept and send’ you are accepting these terms, including:
confirm.bullet1: how much you will pay back and when
confirm.bullet2: what you will use the loan for
confirm.hiddenHelpLink: If you don't understand your loan agreement
confirm.hiddenHelp1: You can contact the integration loan team at
confirm.hiddenHelp2: before accepting the terms. You will be able to return to this form.

complete.text1: You'll receive your loan into the bank, building society or credit union account you gave us in your application. This should happen within 10 working days.
complete.text2: Please refer back to your loan agreement in your email or letter, which will explain how much you need to repay and when.
